attributes.action: To expedite the entrepreneur visa process.legal time is 4 weeks but take months
attributes.background: The actual time for entrepreneur visa extension is 4 weeks but it takes months to reach to a decision. A lot of people lost their loved ones back home but couldn’t go there to attend their funerals. My duaghter was 3 years old and I could see because my visa was in process in home office.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
